description: This sample code is intended to be publicly released on DOECODE. It is an accompaniment to "n automated approach to the alignment of compoundrefractive lenses". It's two small, mostly self-contained scripts that include the complete details necessary to implement the to-be published article's algorithm at a scientific beamline.
name: Sample Code for "An automated approach to the alignment of compound refractive lenses"
organization: Nevada National Security Site/Mission Support and Test Services LLC (MSTS)
tags: Nevada National Security Site/Mission Support and Test Services LLC (MSTS)
